p: RNA was extracted from all collected samples (serum, CSF, and mosquito grinding supernatant) using a Tianlong Nucleic Acid Automatic Extractor (model: Np968.c; Suzhou Tianlong Biotechnology Co., Ltd., Jiangsu, China) with the Tianlong Nucleic Acid Extraction Kit (EX-RNA/DNA virus, Suzhou Tianlong Biotechnology Co., Ltd, Suzhou, China). All operations were carried out in accordance with the manufacturerâ€™s instructions [ 18]. The Ready-To-Go kit (GE Healthcare, Little Chalfont, Buckinghamshire, UK) and random primers (pdN6) (TaKaRa, Shiga, Japan) were used to prepare the cDNA library [ 13, 18].
